qas.question: What event were Chopin and Sand at on 26 July 1840?

answers.text: Berlioz's Grande symphonie funèbre et triomphale

qas.question: What anniversary was the July Revolution that Sand and Chopin were present at a dress rehearsal for?
At whose funeral did Chopin play in 1839?
What instrument did Chopin play at  Adolphe Nourrit's funeral?
What piece did Chopin play at  Adolphe Nourrit's funeral?
Chopin attended the funeral of who in 1839?
What did Chopin play at the funeral?
What was the dress rehearsal for?

answers.text: Berlioz's Grande symphonie funèbre et triomphale

qas.question: It was in commemoration of the tenth anniversary of what?

context: At the funeral of the tenor <a2_0><a5_0>Adolphe Nourrit<a5_0/><a2_0/> in Paris in 1839, Chopin made a rare appearance at the <a3_0>organ<a3_0/>, playing a transcription of <a4_0><a6_0>Franz Schubert's lied Die Gestirne<a4_0/>.<a6_0/> On 26 July 1840 Chopin and Sand were present at the dress rehearsal of <a0_0><a7_0>Berlioz's Grande symphonie funèbre et triomphale<a7_0/><a0_0/>, composed to commemorate the <a1_0>tenth<a1_0/> anniversary of <a8_0>the July Revolution.<a8_0/> Chopin was reportedly unimpressed with the composition.
